summary: An email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim to other attorneys on the Ghislaine Maxwell defense team, transmitting a courtesy copy of a court filing (Suggestion_to_Dkt_404.pdf) in the case U.S. v. Maxwell (S2 20 Cr. 330). The email includes a confidentiality notice and the attorney's updated contact information.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: The sender of the email, identified as an attorney at the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim, representing Ghislaine Maxwell. She is transmitting a court filing to the defense team.

persons.name: Christian Everdell
persons.context: A recipient of the email, likely a member of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense legal team.

persons.name: Laura Menninger
persons.context: A recipient of the email, likely a member of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense legal team.

persons.name: Jeff Pagliuca
persons.context: A recipient of the email, likely a member of Ghislaine Maxwell's defense legal team.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case referenced in the email subject line (U.S. v. Maxwell). She is the client of the attorneys on the email.

connections.description: Sternheim is an attorney representing Maxwell in her criminal case, as indicated by the case caption and the transmission of a defense filing.
Both are attorneys on the same defense team for Ghislaine Maxwell, as evidenced by Sternheim copying Everdell on the email.
Both are attorneys on the same defense team for Ghislaine Maxwell, as evidenced by Sternheim copying Menninger on the email.
Both are attorneys on the same defense team for Ghislaine Maxwell, as evidenced by Sternheim copying Pagliuca on the email.

events.title: Defense Filing Submission
events.description: Bobbi C. Sternheim files a document (Suggestion_to_Dkt_404.pdf) with the court in the case U.S. v. Maxwell and sends a courtesy copy to co-counsel.

keyFacts: The document is an email from Ghislaine Maxwell's defense attorney, Bobbi C. Sternheim, to her co-counsel.
The email transmits a courtesy copy of a court filing (Suggestion_to_Dkt_404.pdf) related to Maxwell's criminal case (S2 20 Cr. 330).
The email confirms the active status of Maxwell's legal defense team, including attorneys Christian Everdell, Laura Menninger, and Jeff Pagliuca, as of November 2021.
The email includes a standard attorney-client confidentiality notice.
Bobbi C. Sternheim provides her updated office address and preferred email address in the signature.
